dblp.social.runner
Class Runner

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.runner.Runner

public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a set of methods needed to properly run the application.

Staffiero

loadDbConfigurations

private static void loadDbConfigurations()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Method reading the db configuration file, written following the java.util.Properties "standards". These properties are needed to create an Hibernate session to save the data that will be parsed.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
Properties

runParserMultiThread

private static boolean runParserMultiThread()
                                     throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            PoolException,
                                            SodaHibernateException,
                                            ThreadException
Runs the parser in multi-thread mode

Returns:
true if when the parser exits all the parts files have been completed, false otherwise.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException
java.io.IOException
PoolException
